desc: Tandem Offroad offers a wide variety of off-road auto parts and accessories of Lexus and Toyota vehicles. We carry wheels, tires, lightbars, and more.

layout.text: We are passionate about providing our customers with quality parts service that they can count on. We specialize on everything Offroad for Toyota and Lexus. Our techs knowledge, our tools, and our suppliers are Toyota centric. We can provide genuine Toyota OEM parts with your repairs.
